solution_line_template: If the distance he took traveling to the East is {east_more_than_south} miles more than the distance he took to travel to the south, he took {south_distance}+{east_more_than_south} = {east_distance} miles traveling to the East.

Johny's total distance traveling to the south and then to the East is {east_distance}+{south_distance} = <<{east_distance}+{south_distance}={south_east_total_distance}>>{south_east_total_distance} miles.
The journey to the North was {north_multiplier}*{east_distance} = <<{north_multiplier}*{east_distance}={north_distance}>>{north_distance}, twice the distance he took traveling to the East.
